name: GlobalActor
desc: A type that represents a globally-unique actor that can be used to isolate various declarations anywhere in the program.

items.name: associatedtype ActorType
items.desc: The type of the shared actor instance that will be used to provide mutually-exclusive access to declarations annotated with the given global actor type.

items.name: static var shared: Self.ActorType
items.desc: The shared actor instance that will be used to provide mutually-exclusive access to declarations annotated with the given global actor type.

items.name: static var sharedUnownedExecutor: UnownedSerialExecutor
items.desc: The shared executor instance that will be used to provide mutually-exclusive access for the global actor.
